name: AmiOmega
overview: Omega is usually considered the first roguelike game with a traditional plot. AmiOmega is Omega's Amiga port; named differently on the platform due to Origin's tank design/programming game "Omega" released the previous year. In AmiOmega, you play a protagonist that has been transported to another world by the Omega Project. You are trying to become an Adept, a person of immense power who follows the Buddhism-like principles of the Lords of Omega, by undergoing a series of quests.
